title: Evaluation Design for Intensive Mathematics Instruction Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and secondary-level math proficiency
context.additional_context: An intermediate mathematics proficiency improvement course for office/administrative professionals, featuring project-based assessments in constrained technology environments (primarily smartphones) with flexible scheduling

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively diagnose their understanding of mathematical concepts through formative assessments.
Learners can identify personal knowledge gaps based on assessment results and create a supplementary learning plan.
Learners can apply evaluation strategies that reflect differences in problem-solving abilities based on calculator usage.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
